name: David Ramirez
text: Yeah. Uber actually really does some sketchy stuff. It's just, compared to Philippines gov sketchy stuff, uber sketch stuff is trivial....    But srsly, I bet of grab offered sufficient stock shares to Marcos and the D team, their legal issues would be mysteriously solved.
